about.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Maximiliano, an enthusiastic programmer eager to explore exciting career opportunities to kickstart my journey in the tech world. I stand out for my passion and commitment to programming, where I've developed strong skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux, Node.js, Sequelize and PosgreSQL.
about.paragraph2: My ability to quickly adapt to the work environment and my willingness to learn continuously are aspects I consider crucial for my professional growth. I am a proactive and dedicated individual, always ready to take on new challenges and tackle them with determination.
about.paragraph3: Beyond the coding realm, I love maintaining an active lifestyle. Engaging in sports not only helps me strike a healthy balance between mind and body but also reinforces my ability to work in teams and achieve common goals.
about.paragraph4: I am excited about the opportunity to contribute my programming passion and eagerness to learn to a dynamic team. I look forward to applying my skills and continuing my professional development in a stimulating environment!

projects.trendyShopDescription: Web app e-commerce clothing store, group project carried out for the Soy Henry bootcamp.

projects.wordleDescription: I developed an interactive clone of the popular word game 'Wordle' using modern web technologies. I utilized React for building the front-end, leveraging its reusable components and efficient state management. The game's styling was achieved through the use of SCSS
